properties.description: D360 Bank is a private, shariah-compliant digital bank headquartered in Saudi Arabia, with 326 employees and 46.8% annual growth. It has raised $439.7M in funding, offers tailored, secure, and transparent banking services, and focuses on innovation to enhance financial accessibility in the Kingdom.

properties.description: Private Saudi banking company specializing in secure digital banking services for personal and enterprise clients; 208 employees with 23.6% YoY growth; licensed by the Saudi Central Bank in June 2021; headquartered in Saudi Arabia.
properties.content:
## The Future of Smart Banking Starts With You

### We bring you carefully designed financial solutions tailored to meet your needs and aspirations, helping you achieve your financial goals effortlessly and enhancing your quality of life.

Create a Murabaha Term Deposit in less than a minute with an amount of only 1,000 SAR Enjoy competitive returns with short to long terms starting from just seven days.

Vision Bank savings account taking just seconds to open and its designed to help you achieve your goals with simple and confident steps.

Choose from a variety of designs to find the card that suits you best, all while maintaining privacy and security.

1. ## Security is Our Priority



We employ the best practices and cutting-edge technologies to deliver reliable banking services.


Item 1 of 4

## FAQs

### Is Vision Bank licensed in Saudi Arabia?

Yes, Vision Bank is licensed in KSA and regulated and supervised by the Saudi Central Bank (SAMA).

### Is Vision Bank compliant with Islamic Shariah Principles?

Yes.

### Is Vision Bank a wallet?

No. Vision Bank is a digital bank that will offer a full range of financial solutions.

### When will I have an account with Vision Bank?

Register on the priority list through the Vision Bank website or application. When it is your turn, you will receive an SMS with an invite code to open your account. This code can only be used once.

© 2025 Vision Bank. All rights reserved.

Closed Joint Stock Company with a Capital of SAR 1,500,000,000, CR No. 1010850478 Licensed in accordance with the Council of Ministers decree No. 672 dated 12/11/1442H corresponding to 22/06/2021G, Subject to the supervision of the Saudi Central Bank, 6537 King Abdulaziz Rd., King Salman Dist. 12432 Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.

## © 2025 Vision Bank. All rights reserved. Closed Joint Stock Company, Capital of SAR 1,500,000,000. Commercial Registration 1010850478, National Address 6537 Riyadh 12432-2693, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia

properties.description: HALA is a private financial services company specializing in banking solutions for SMEs; with 355 employees (+19.8% YoY growth), $25M annual revenue, founded in 2017, based in Saudi Arabia. It has raised $7.1M in funding, last via a convertible note in November 2022. The company focuses on digital payments, premium domain names, and seamless transactions, aiming to build the future bank for SMEs. It ranks #339,703 globally, #86 in its industry, and #4133 in Saudi Arabia, with a web presence of 92,900 monthly visits.

المنتجات

## المنتجات

اكتشف منتجات مبتكرة مصمّمة خصيصاً لأعمالك، من الحسابات البنكية إلى المدفوعات، إدارة المصروفات، التمويل والمزيد.

## كافة احتياجات عملياتك المالية. منصة واحدة.

حساب الأعمال الذي يعطيك تسوية فورية للمبيعات إلى حسابك، مع قبول وإرسال المدفوعات والتحكم في المصروفات والحصول على التمويل لتنمية منشأتك، وكلّ ذلك من منصة واحدة.

# موثوق من قبل الشركات الصغيرة والمتوسطة

هلا هي الحل البسيط والموثوق لإدارة الشؤون المالية للشركات الصغيرة في المملكة العربية السعودية. من المدفوعات إلى المشتريات والتمويل، نحن نغطي كل شيء.

#### 100,000 شركة صغيرة ومتوسطة

التجار يستخدمون هلا يوميًا

####  20 مليار

حجم المعاملات المعالجة

#### مرخصة من البنك المركزي السعودي (ساما)

مؤسسة مالية مرخصة بالكامل في السعودية

هلا هي منصة تقنية مالية رائدة تهتم بتمكين المنشآت الصغيرة والمتوسطة من إدارة إيراداتهم .ومدفوعاتهم بطريقة سهلة وآمنة

company.name: HALA
company.about:
Our focus is to empower SMEs to manage, run, and grow their businesses seamlessly with our all-in-one platform.
We're building the future bank of SMEs—where managing finances is not just about transactions but about empowering businesses to achieve their fullest potential. By embracing innovation and fostering strong relationships, we push the boundaries of what’s possible, offering not just financial solutions but a movement for change.
Join us as we continue to support SMEs in their journey toward success and redefine the banking landscape with integrity and creativity.
